short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a new option on the context menu to search on Metal-Archives (band, album or artirst) for a selected term.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search quickly for bands, albuns or artists. Select the term you want to search, right click on it and the menu option 'Metallum Search' will appear giving you the options to search on the website for a band, album or a artist.
